user_prompt: Create comprehensive Group Participation Monitor Agent testing integration with UI components. This agent replaces Group Management Workflows automation and integrates with app/membermanagement/page.tsx for Group participation data display. Agent file location: deep-agents-from-scratch/agents/phase2/group_participation_openai.py. Functions include: Small group attendance tracking, Bible study engagement monitoring, Ministry team participation analysis, Group health metrics calculation, Meeting reminder automation. Reference the existing attendance-agent-testing-integration spec structure, AgentTestingSection pattern from app/components/dashboard/sections/AgentTestingSection.tsx, backend API pattern from backend/attendance_api.py, and agent integration from attendance_analyzer_openai.py. Create testing sections in Member Management page similar to AgentMemberTest component. Include comprehensive UI integration for group participation data visualization and management workflows.
